discourse_list.title: Uniswap DAO can help 80K UNI to Turkey to relief after the big earthquake disaster

content.content: Uniswap Community supporters, Whole World is helping Turkey right now. Snapshot (Snapshot ) There was a catastrophic earthquake that equal to about 32 atomic bombs in Turkey. The donation will be sent to the Ahbap foundation, which was the most active in Turkey in this earthquake. Ahbap foundation is very well known and legitimate foundation works in coordinate with the governmental organizations. They are the most trustable NGO in Turkey right now. The number of deaths is more than 30K and is increasing day by day unfortunately   70% of the cities affected by the earthquake disappeared!  Uniswap is always seen as the best DEX in global in the Turkey! According to Similarweb data, Turkey ranks 7th among the countries where uniswap receives the most web traffic. The Turkish ecosystem will never forget this help from the Uniswap DAO treasury. Among the top 10 crypto exchanges volume, Turkey user constitutes an important part of the crypto trade volume. Please also review this post we shared on the Uniswap forum ( Uniswap DAO helps Turkiye earthquake )
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses how the Uniswap DAO can help Turkey after a catastrophic earthquake. The proposal suggests donating 80K UNI to the Ahbap foundation, a legitimate NGO that is coordinating with the government to provide relief. The post also highlights the importance of the Turkish ecosystem to Uniswap and how this help will be remembered. The post is explaining the proposal and a 3rd party is extending to the proposal by giving entirely positive feedback.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

discourse_list.title: Consensus Check \xe2\x80\x94 [Uniswap DAO can help 80K UNI to Turkey to relief after the big earthquake disaster]

content.content: Uniswap Community supporters, Thanks to your support, we passed the temperature check, the first phase(Tempature Check) of the governance with 98% yes votes. https://snapshot.org/#/uniswap/proposal/0x374d7f9ba673e65d6a85c3cfcc082fd3ad22ca5d8f9f44ac14e1d67154640d90 The number of deaths is more than 40K and is increasing day by day unfortunately  There was 70% destruction in 10 cities affected by the earthquake. The whole world is helping Turkey right now, from the countries to singers or company are donating to Turkey to relieve the damage after the catastrophic earthquake. We had planned to transfer the donation from UniswapDAO to the Ahbap foundation first (as in our forum or temperature check, Uniswap DAO helps Turkiye earthquake ), but the Turkish fiscal authority asked them to close their accounts and move the money to the bank. Also, after the authority has allowed to crypto donations, a multisig has been established last week, named Anka relief. They will direct all the funds raised to legitimate and trusted NGOs that address multiple humanitarian needs. Vitalik Buterin also has chosen Anka Relief multisig to donate.  twitter.com    armagan.eth 🏴 @0xarmagan  50 ETH from @VitalikButerin to @AnkaRelief 🙌❤️ twitter.com/AnkaRelief/sta… https://t.co/Wr2JmncbKQ   7:59 AM - 12 Feb 2023           68                17            Multisig wallet signers are people known in the crypto ecosystem and the necessary information is explained in the link we shared. They are the most trustable Crpyto multisig in Turkey right now Anka Relief, https://twitter.com/AnkaRelief Uniswap is always seen as the best DEX in global in the Turkey! According to similarweb data, Turkey ranks 7th among the countries where uniswap receives the most web traffic. The Turkish ecosystem will never forget this aid from the Uniswap DAO treasury. Among the top 10 crypto exchange volumes, Turkey user accounts for a significant portion of the crypto trading volume. There are 8 million crypto traders You can find donations made by crypto exchange and blockchain platforms in this tweet.  twitter.com    Sima Baktas @simabaktas  @MinaProtocol  : 50.000 USD   1:09 PM - 9 Feb 2023           4            You can find the total aid of 11m USD(target) initiated by the local exchange here(BtcTurk)   pro.btcturk.com   BtcTurk | PRO - Profesyonelce Bitcoin ve kriptopara al-sat BtcTurk PRO ile profesyonelce Bitcoin ve kriptopara alın ve satın.      This assistance by Uniswap DAO will be a very important support when there is a need for lobbying with legal authority in Turkey. Link to temperature check governance forum post: Uniswap DAO can help 80K UNI to Turkey to relief after the big earthquake disaster
content.GPT-summary: The post is an update on a proposal to donate 80K UNI to Turkey for earthquake relief. The author explains that the donation will be made through a trusted multisig wallet and provides information on other donations made by crypto exchanges and blockchain platforms. A 3rd party gives constructive criticism, suggesting that the proposal should have been more specific about which NGOs the funds will be directed to. Another 3rd party extends to the proposal, stating that the assistance will be important for lobbying with legal authority in Turkey.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

discourse_list.title: [Governance Proposal] Uniswap DAO can help 80K UNI to Turkiye to relief after the big earthquake disaster

content.content: [Governance Proposal] Uniswap DAO can help 80K UNI to Turkiye to relief after the big earthquake disaster Authors: Yunus Cebeci, İdil Dadan, Murat Akça Related Discussions: Voting for the on-chain Governance Proposal will go live on March 18.  Vote with fish.vote Fish.vote | Uniswap DAO can help 80K UNI to Turkiye to relief after the big earthquake disaster    Past Proposal Links  Consensus Check: discussion, snapshot  (passed with 1.1 M UNI in favor) Temperature Check: discussion, snapshot (passed with 31K UNI in favor)  Tldr; 2 catastrophic earthquakes struck Turkiye and North Syria on February 6th, wrecked havoc on 11 cities and devastated a region 12 times the size of Belgium. More than 45,000 people lost their lives, 23 million got affected, and over 202.000 (Source) buildings have collapsed, severely damaged or need to be demolished immediately. Only within a few hours, the global crypto community joined forces to send donations to Turkish NGOs working to provide relief efforts. In our proposal, we ask the Uniswap community to takepart in the cause by sending 80K UNI to Anka Relief – a multisig Fund led by web3 industry leaders that will distribute the funds to high-impact NGOs on the ground. Abstract The latest official reports from AFAD (Disaster and Emergency Management Authority) indicate that only in Turkiye nearly 45,000 people lost their lives and the death toll is expected to increase due to the several aftershocks since the earthquake, which are causing more destruction and further casualties. The whole world is mobilized to help Turkiye right now. Aid is coming in from foreign governments, international cooperations and Web3 protocols to help the people of Turkiye after the catastrophic earthquakes. So far, proposals have passed on the forums of Cosmos, 1inch, CityDAO distributing donations to several relief organizations. Prominent Web3 leaders such as Vitalik, Hayden Adams and Sandeep Nailwal have also personally donated to the cause. Because of the large damage area of the earthquake, Turkiye will need a sustainable support system and all the help it can get for the long term. As members of the Uniswap Turkish community, we have done our due diligence and research to choose the best option to direct our possible donation. We have chosen Anka Relief Fund as a prospect receiver of UNI donations. You can find detailed information about Anka Relief Fund, under the specification & rationale section. If the proposal passes, this donation will touch thousands of lives, especially significantly improving the future well-being of children. 8 million active crypto traders in Turkiye will surely not forget such a donation from Uniswap, which will have an enormous positive impact on the relationship between Uniswap and the Turkish crypto ecosystem. Motivation Thanks to your support, we passed the temperature check to donate to an established and trusted Turkish NGO working on the earthquake relief efforts. The first phase of the governance with 98% and the consensus check, the second phase of the governance with 99% yes votes . In this proposal, we are asking the Uniswap community to donate 80K UNI toward the earthquake relief efforts in Turkiye. We had initially planned to transfer donations from UniswapDAO to the Ahbab foundation, the aforementioned NGO, as in our forum or temperature check https://gov.uniswap.org/t/uniswap-dao-helps-turkiye-earthquake/20352 ), but Ahbab recently stopped receiving donations to its crypto wallet. Because of this, upon doing research over the web3 relief efforts in Turkiye, we decided to donate to Anka Relief, a multisig fund led by web3 industry leaders– who will direct all the funds raised to legitimate and trusted NGOs that address multiple humanitarian needs. Vitalik Buterin also has chosen Anka Relief multisig to donate. (Source) Specification & Rationale Introducing ANKA Relief Multisig Fund Anka Relief core team has a history of successful impact projects including Unchain Fund ( $10M for humanitarian aid in Ukraine following the full scale invasion, which launched a direct aid model that provided support to more than 400,000 people, receiving a $2.5M donation from Vitalik) and Save Pakistan Relief NFT Fundraising (which launched the first ever NFTs tied to humanitarian relief goods, distributing food, water, sanitation & shelter to thousands of people throughout the ongoing flooding crisis). Anka Relief has received over $210K in donations, including a 50 ETH donation from Vitalik Buterin, since its launch on February 9th and has since been working to help NGOs that are part of Afet Platformu, Acikacik.org and more to open crypto donation accounts. Aid collection events by NGOs are subject to prior permission of the Turkish government, except the rare exemption of being designated as “an NGO working for the public”. For that reason, funds should be donated to the accounts of legitimate NGOs directly. Considering this legal landscape, Anka is focused on onboarding these NGOs, so that crypto donations will be transferred to the crypto wallets of the chosen NGOs, which they can off-ramp to Turkish Lira via central exchanges Anka is collaborating with. Anka Relief’s main goal is to provide support to mid-term impact focused NGOs rather than immediate humanitarian aid. Hence the multisig fund will be holding to distribute most of the funds for 4-8 weeks as on the ground research & NGO onboarding efforts continue. The organizations Anka has been largely directing its efforts so far to onboard are focused on mid and long term relief efforts, especially spanning areas of recovery, physical and mental health, women, children and vulnerable communities as well as education. Here are the 5 NGOs that Anka has been considering to direct first batch of donations: 1.Kedv : 2.Onemsiyoruz  3.AÇEV 4.Robotel 5.Needs Map It is important to note here that this is not the final nor exhaustive list of NGOs and Anka’s on the ground team will be evaluating high-impact organizations as on-the-ground situation evolves over the course of the next few weeks. You can see the Anka Multisigner list below  Rene Reingsberg - Co-Founder @Celo  Marek Olszewsk - Co-Founder @Celo  Eva Beylin - Director @TheGraphProtocol  Scott Moore - Co-founder @ Gitcoin  Alona Shevchenko - Co-founder & Operational lead @ Ukraine DAO (, )  Bilal Bin Saqib - Co-founder @ Tayaba.org & One Million Meals  CJ Hetherington - Co-founder @ Atlantis World  Luuk Weber - Founder @ Kolektivo  Berk Sohtorik - Co-founder @ Earthist  Doğa Öztüzün - Partner @ Muhabbit Capital   Buğra Çelik - Board Member @ imece . Benefits (Pros) and Our Ask: Uniswap has unquestionably positioned itself as the leading and most trusted DEX in the world, especially by the crypto community in Turkiye! According to similarweb data, Turkiye ranks 7th among the countries where Uniswap receives the most web traffic. In addition, the number of Turkiye-based users in the top global crypto exchanges is quite high. Users from Turkiye account for a significant portion of the global crypto trading volume, with over 8 million active crypto traders. This kind of aid and support coming from Uniswap will be one of the largest coming from a decentralized organization and surely will not be forgotten. It will solidify Uniswap’s reputation within the Turkish crypto ecosystem. With Uniswap co-founder Hayden Adams also supporting the Turkiye relief efforts(source), the accumulated support will certainly increase Turkish community’s gratitude and loyalty to Uniswap and will also help the further localization of Uniswap in Turkiye. We will communicate to the Turkish crypto ecosystem, in IRL gatherings, online and beyond that this aid took place thanks to Uniswap, which is the flag bearer of decentralized organizations. Naturally, this Uniswap Proposal has already started to be talked about through word of mouth in Turkiye and people are excited about the prospect of this donation coming true. You can find donations made by crypto exchange and blockchain platforms in this tweet. (Source) You can find the total aid of 11m USD(target) initiated by the local exchange here(BtcTurk) (Source) Authors: Yunus Cebeci, İdil Dadan, Murat Akça Related Discussions: Voting for the on-chain Governance Proposal will go live on March 2. Past Proposal Links Consensus Check: discussion, snapshot (passed with 1.1 M UNI in favor) Temperature Check: discussion, snapshot (passed with 31K UNI in favor) Tldr; 2 catastrophic earthquakes struck Turkiye and North Syria on February 6th, wrecked havoc on 11 cities and devastated a region 12 times the size of Belgium. More than 45,000 people lost their lives, 23 million got affected, and over 202.000* buildings have collapsed, severely damaged or need to be demolished immediately. Only within a few hours, the global crypto community joined forces to send donations to Turkish NGOs working to provide relief efforts. In our proposal, we ask the Uniswap community to takepart in the cause by sending 80K UNI to Anka Relief – a multisig Fund led by web3 industry leaders that will distribute the funds to high-impact NGOs on the ground. *BAKAN KURUM: "582 BİN BAĞIMSIZ BÖLÜM VE 202 BİN BİNANIN ACİL YIKILACAK, AĞIR HASARLI VEYA YIKIK OLDUĞU TESPİTİNİ YAPTIK" Abstract The latest official reports from AFAD (Disaster and Emergency Management Authority) indicate that only in Turkiye nearly 45,000 people lost their lives and the death toll is expected to increase due to the several aftershocks since the earthquake, which are causing more destruction and further casualties. The whole world is mobilized to help Turkiye right now. Aid is coming in from foreign governments, international cooperations and Web3 protocols to help the people of Turkiye after the catastrophic earthquakes. So far, proposals have passed on the forums of Cosmos*, 1inch**, CityDAO*** distributing donations to several relief organizations. *Interchain Explorer by Cosmostation **Snapshot ***Snapshot Prominent Web3 leaders such as Vitalik*, Hayden Adams** and Sandeep Nailwal*** have also personally donated to the cause. *Ethereum Transaction Hash (Txhash) Details | Etherscan **https://twitter.com/haydenzadams/status/1624155267276447745 ***https://twitter.com/sandeepnailwal/status/1624083642862473216 Because of the large damage area of the earthquake, Turkiye will need a sustainable support system and all the help it can get for the long term. As members of the Uniswap Turkish community, we have done our due diligence and research to choose the best option to direct our donation. We have chosen Anka Relief Fund as a prospect receiver of UNI donations. You can find detailed information about Anka Relief Fund, under the specification & rationale section. If the proposal passes, this donation will touch thousands of lives, especially significantly improving the future well-being of children. 8 million active crypto traders in Turkiye will surely not forget such a donation from Uniswap, which will have an enormous positive impact on the relationship between Uniswap and the Turkish crypto ecosystem. Motivation Thanks to your support, we passed the temperature check to donate to an established and trusted Turkish NGO working on the earthquake relief efforts. The first phase of the governance with 98% and the consensus check, the second phase of the governance with 99% yes votes . In this proposal, we are asking the Uniswap community to donate 80K UNI toward the earthquake relief efforts in Turkiye. We had initially planned to transfer donations from UniswapDAO to the Ahbab foundation, the aforementioned NGO, as in our forum or temperature check Uniswap DAO helps Turkiye earthquake ), but Ahbab recently stopped receiving donations to its crypto wallet. Because of this, upon doing research over the web3 relief efforts in Turkiye, we decided to donate to Anka Relief, a multisig fund led by web3 industry leaders– who will direct all the funds raised to legitimate and trusted NGOs that address multiple humanitarian needs. Vitalik Buterin* also has chosen Anka Relief multisig to donate. Fish.vote version [Governance Proposal] Uniswap DAO can help 80K UNI to Turkiye to relief after the big earthquake disaster *Ethereum Transaction Hash (Txhash) Details | Etherscan Specification & Rationale Introducing ANKA Relief Multisig Fund Anka Relief* core team has a history of successful impact projects including Unchain Fund ( $10M for humanitarian aid in Ukraine following the full scale invasion, which launched a direct aid model that provided support to more than 400,000 people, receiving a $2.5M donation from Vitalik) and Save Pakistan Relief NFT Fundraising (which launched the first ever NFTs tied to humanitarian relief goods, distributing food, water, sanitation & shelter to thousands of people throughout the ongoing flooding crisis). *https://ankarelief.org/ Anka Relief has received over $210K in donations, including a 50 ETH donation from Vitalik Buterin, since its launch on February 9th and has since been working to help NGOs that are part of Afet Platformu*, Acikacik.org** and more to open crypto donation accounts. *https://afetplatformu.org.tr/ **STK Anasayfa | Açık Açık Aid collection events by NGOs are subject to prior permission of the Turkish government, except the rare exemption of being designated as “an NGO working for the public”. For that reason, funds should be donated to the accounts of legitimate NGOs directly. Considering this legal landscape, Anka is focused on onboarding these NGOs, so that crypto donations will be transferred to the crypto wallets of the chosen NGOs, which they can off-ramp to Turkish Lira via central exchanges Anka is collaborating with. Anka Relief’s main goal is to provide support to mid-term impact focused NGOs rather than immediate humanitarian aid. Hence the multisig fund will be holding to distribute most of the funds for 4-8 weeks as on the ground research & NGO onboarding efforts continue. The organizations Anka has been largely directing its efforts so far to onboard are focused on mid and long term relief efforts, especially spanning areas of recovery, physical and mental health, women, children and vulnerable communities as well as education. Here are the 5 NGOs that Anka has been considering to direct first batch of donations: 1.Kedv (https://afetplatformu.org.tr/uyeler/kedv/) 2.Onemsiyoruz (Önemsiyoruz Derneği | Açık Açık) 3.AÇEV (ANNE ÇOCUK EĞİTİM VAKFI – Afet Platformu) 4.Robotel (https://robotel.org/) 5.Needs Map (https://ihtiyacharitasi.org/) It is important to note here that this is not the final nor exhaustive list of NGOs and Anka’s on the ground team will be evaluating high-impact organizations as on-the-ground situation evolves over the course of the next few weeks. Benefits (Pros) and Our Ask: Uniswap has unquestionably positioned itself as the leading and most trusted DEX in the world, especially by the crypto community in Turkiye! According to similarweb data, Turkiye ranks 7th among the countries where Uniswap receives the most web traffic. In addition, the number of Turkiye-based users in the top global crypto exchanges is quite high. Users from Turkiye account for a significant portion of the global crypto trading volume, with over 8 million active crypto traders. This kind of aid and support coming from Uniswap will be one of the largest coming from a decentralized organization and surely will not be forgotten. It will solidify Uniswap’s reputation within the Turkish crypto ecosystem. With Uniswap co-founder Hayden Adams also supporting the Turkiye relief efforts*, the accumulated support will certainly increase Turkish community’s gratitude and loyalty to Uniswap and will also help the further localization of Uniswap in Turkiye. *https://twitter.com/haydenzadams/status/1624155267276447745?s=12&t=A9PEwVZuwAwnCHHJO8M6Ag We will communicate to the Turkish crypto ecosystem, in IRL gatherings, online and beyond that this aid took place thanks to Uniswap, which is the flag bearer of decentralized organizations. Dear Uniswap community, As one of the owner of the voting proposal and also a humabeing spent 1 week in the region with International Medical Relief organizaon, I can easily say, the needs of the region is almost same. Some of the towns have just erased from the map, in some towns more than 80% buildings collapsed. There are different kind of needs of that region and the victims of earthquake. Humanitarian help for short term, but also some educational or financial support for midterm that helps them to come back to life again. We really need a lot of help for the people live there and we are hoping the contribution of Uniswap DAO

It’s been a disaster for 11 cities with more than 50K casualties, 300K+ buildings collapsed and more than 13M people directly affected. Words wouldn’t be enough to describe, yet you wouldn’t be the same person if you ever visit the eq zone and vitness it. We need all the support of Uniswap community to support people in the area for a long time to come. Thank you all.
Dear Uniswap community, Turkey need your support on these harsh days. I am hopping crypto community will help as they can.

Dear Uniswap community, The situation in the region has been the same since the day of the earthquake and we are still far from meeting their needs. Even though it is not in the news as much as it used to be, people in the completely destroyed areas are still waiting for help. Even after the search and rescue operations, the needs of the people in the region do not end. It is time to take steps to get them back to normal life as soon as possible. We really need a lot of help for the people living there and we hope that Uniswap DAO will contribute sensitively.

Thank you for all the support and for submitting this proposal to the Uniswap community. The residents of the region are still desperately in need of basic necessities like shelter, food, hygienic living conditions, etc.   On the other hand, it is essential that the aid to be provided to the area should be long-term and sustainable. The continuation of donations and helps of every sort from the global crypto ecosystem in order to implement forward-looking projects for all people affected by the earthquake, especially for women, children, and university students, requires great humanitarian effort. It should be the duty of everyone, especially NGOs, to be able to implement these projects with your help.

Dear Uniswap community, recent earthquakes in Turkey have left countless families devastated, and the need for assistance is more urgent than ever. Despite the decrease in media attention, the reality on the ground remains dire, with many people still lacking access to basic necessities like shelter, clean water, and food. As a global crypto community, we have the power to make a difference in the lives of those affected. I wholeheartedly encourage Uniswap DAO to take part in the relief efforts and help rebuild the affected communities. Let’s show the world the compassionate side of the crypto sphere and contribute to a better future for all those impacted by this tragedy.

As you know, the Turkish citizens need to support after this disaster, the earthquake completed but the we must support for survive of the peoples, i beleive the Uniswap DAO can help the people and share to pain of us.
